name: Texas A&M University Racquetball Club
description:
WELCOME!

The TAMU Racquetball Club is here to provide anyone who wants to play the opportunity to improve their game, meet great people who share a common interest, and most importantly HAVE FUN!

We take our sport very seriously and have very competitve spirits, but we also know that the whole point of racquetball is to have fun playing with great people and we strive to create an atmosphere that compliments that philosophy. We want you to achieve all the goals you set for yourself on the court and will do our best to help you reach them.

No matter what your skill level, you are welcome to come play with us. If you are looking to take your game to the next level and to compete in tournaments or just want to figure out what all those people are doing on the first floor of the Rec, come on out to a practice and see what we are all about. Don't hesitate to ask us questions or to play!  

We meet at the REC Mondays and Wednesdays from 7pm to 10pm on courts 1-6.
If you're interested in joining, check us out here!

We host a semesterly tournament! It's called the Aggieland Classic, and it's an open event for all levels. Check out upcoming tournaments here!

Racquetball is a fun way to meet great people and stay in shape at the same time so come out and see us!If you have any questions, talk to a member or feel free to email us at racquetball.tamu@gmail.com!

 

 

Texas A&M Racquetball Club

We are a member of Texas A&M Rec Sports
summary: The TAMU Racquetball Club strives to promote racquetball at Texas A&M University for all skill levels through clinics, demo days, tournaments, and practice....
